I love creating websites

Posted on Fri, 01 Mar 2019 08:01:56 GMT
Ideas

Random thought: I really love creating websites ðŸ¤© because they give me the chance to simultaneously create something that did not exist before, solve puzzles, learn new things constantly, try out new technologies, use the internet all day, listen to music while working, improve the lives of users (even if in a tiny way), get to meet lots of smart and interesting people. The feeling is really empowering.
